name: Faceless Void
title: Darkterror
lore: Darkterror the Faceless Void is a creature of another realm, bound by powerful magic to exist between dimensions.

timeWalk.name: Time Walk
timeWalk.description: Rushes to a location and reverses all damage taken in the last few seconds.

timeDilation.name: Time Dilation
timeDilation.description: Slows enemies in an area and freezes their ability cooldowns.

timelock.name: Time Lock
timelock.description: Gives a chance to lock an enemy in time, stunning and dealing bonus damage.

chronosphere.name: Chronosphere
chronosphere.description: Creates a sphere where time stands still. All units except Faceless Void are frozen.
